metadata.Title: CVE-2020-29600 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
In AWStats through 7.7, cgi-bin/awstats.pl?config= accepts an absolute pathname, even though it was intended to only read a file in the /etc/awstats/awstats.conf format. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2017-1000501.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-29600` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

awstats - 7.6+dfsg-2ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> fix is incomplete, see CVE-2020-35176

criterions.comment: awstats package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.6+dfsg-2ubuntu0.20.04.1').
